snippet: Koch Industries accused the Senate majority leader of spreading “false information” about the brothers by suggesting they are behind the move to end financing for President Obama’s healthcare law and the partial shutdown of the federal...
abstract: Koch Industries accused the Senate majority leader of spreading “false information” about the brothers by suggesting they are behind the move to end financing for President Obama’s healthcare law and the partial shutdown of the federal government.

headline.main: Kochs Deny Pushing for Shutdown Over Health Law
